channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- QRadar SIEM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- QRadar SIEM

item.title: CVE-2021-38869|2024-08-04T01:51:20.504Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 in some situations may not automatically log users out after they exceede their idle timeout. IBM X-Force ID: 208341.

item.title: CVE-2021-38939|2024-08-04T01:51:20.603Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 stores potentially sensitive information in log files that could be read by an user with access to creating domains. IBM X-Force ID: 211037.

item.title: CVE-2021-39088|2024-08-04T01:58:17.738Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 is vulnerable to local privilege escalation if this could be combined with other unknown vulnerabilities then privilege escalation could be performed. IBM X-Force ID: 216111.

item.title: CVE-2021-38936|2024-08-04T01:51:20.764Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 could disclose highly sensitive information to a privileged user. IBM X-Force ID: 210893.

item.title: CVE-2021-39041|2024-08-04T01:58:17.283Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 may be vulnerable to partial denial of service attack, resulting in some protocols not listening to specified ports. IBM X-Force ID: 214028.

item.title: CVE-2021-38919|2024-08-04T01:51:20.865Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 in some senarios may reveal authorized service tokens to other QRadar users. IBM X-Force ID: 210021

item.title: CVE-2021-38874|2024-08-04T01:51:20.371Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 allows for users to access information across tenant and domain boundaries in some situations. IBM X-Force ID: 208397.

item.title: CVE-2021-38878|2024-08-04T01:51:20.452Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 could allow a malicious actor to impersonate an actor due to key exchange without entity authentication. IBM X-Force ID: 208756.

item.title: CVE-2023-50961|2024-08-02T22:23:44.133Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 275939.

item.title: CVE-2023-50949|2024-08-02T22:23:44.080Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 could allow an unauthorized user to perform unauthorized actions due to improper certificate validation. IBM X-Force ID: 275706.

item.title: CVE-2024-28784|2024-07-12T21:17:31.087Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 285893.

item.title: CVE-2023-50961|2024-06-04T17:17:59.051Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 275939.

item.title: CVE-2023-50949|2024-04-11T16:54:41.741Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 could allow an unauthorized user to perform unauthorized actions due to improper certificate validation. IBM X-Force ID: 275706.

item.title: CVE-2024-28784|2024-03-27T12:33:45.889Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 285893.

item.title: CVE-2024-27269|2024-06-04T17:47:00.230Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 could allow a privileged user to configure user management that would disclose unintended sensitive information across tenants. IBM X-Force ID: 284575.

item.title: CVE-2023-50949|2024-06-26T15:37:11.292Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 could allow an unauthorized user to perform unauthorized actions due to improper certificate validation. IBM X-Force ID: 275706.

item.title: CVE-2024-27269|2024-08-02T00:27:59.955Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 could allow a privileged user to configure user management that would disclose unintended sensitive information across tenants. IBM X-Force ID: 284575.

item.title: CVE-2024-28784|2024-08-02T00:56:58.190Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 285893.
